price: Igihe Twebwe Allah Tubarungikiye Intumwa zibiri, kugira zibararikire isengwa ry’Imana Imwe Rudende Allah bakazihakana bivuye inyuma, Duca Tuzitera intege mu kurungikwa kw’Intumwa igira gatatu, nya Ntumwa uko ari zitatu zikavuga ziti: “Mu vy’ukuri, twebwe turi Intumwa zarungitswe kuri mwebwe”.
arabic: إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِمُ ٱثۡنَيۡنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزۡنَا بِثَالِثٖ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُم مُّرۡسَلُونَ

meta.transliteration: idh arsalnā ilayhimu ith'nayni fakadhabūhumā faʿazzaznā bithālithin faqālū innā ilaykum mur'salūna
translations: but they denied both of them
